body:
Hi Grasshope, Sorry to hear you guys still have issues. It's usually a matter of unblocking the GHPython.gha file. If the file is already unblocked then make sure Rhino is also updated. That should solve the problem. There are couple of similar discussions like this on the group.

From Rhino 6 Python component will come as default Grasshopper component. That should make our life much easier. :)
